item.description:
Never Back Down

Alternate Artwork 1 | Alternate Artwork 2 | Alternate Artwork 3 | Alternate Artwork 4 | Alternate Artwork 5 | Poster 1 | Poster 2 | Poster 3 | Poster 4 | Thumbnail | Key Art

2008 | PG13 | Action • Adventure • Dramas
Djimon Hounsou, Sean Faris, Amber Heard
Directed By: Jeff Wadlow

Description
A rebellious teenager (Sean Faris) learns to fight from a veteran (Djimon Hounsou) of mixed martial arts after joining an underground fight club.
